amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary to participate in the America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 822 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 822 proposed by Senator Boozman. (consideration: CR S3445; text: CR S3445) To authorize the Secretary to participate in the America the Beautiful National Parks and Federal Recreational Lands Pass program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 822 proposed by Senator Boozman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 822 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
